11#ifndef MODULES_AUDIO_PROCESSING_AGC_AGC_MANAGER_DIRECT_H_
12#define MODULES_AUDIO_PROCESSING_AGC_AGC_MANAGER_DIRECT_H_
13
14#include <memory>
15
16#include "absl/types/optional.h"
17#include "modules/audio_processing/agc/agc.h"
18#include "modules/audio_processing/audio_buffer.h"
19#include "modules/audio_processing/logging/apm_data_dumper.h"
20#include "rtc_base/gtest_prod_util.h"
21
22namespace webrtc {
23
24class MonoAgc;
25class GainControl;
26
27// Direct interface to use AGC to set volume and compression values.
28// AudioProcessing uses this interface directly to integrate the callback-less
29// AGC.
30//
31// This class is not thread-safe.
32class AgcManagerDirect final {
33 public:
34 // AgcManagerDirect will configure GainControl internally. The user is
35 // responsible for processing the audio using it after the call to Process.
36 // The operating range of startup_min_level is [12, 255] and any input value
37 // outside that range will be clamped.
38 AgcManagerDirect(int num_capture_channels,
39 int startup_min_level,
40 int clipped_level_min,
41 bool disable_digital_adaptive,
42 int sample_rate_hz);
43
44 ~AgcManagerDirect();
45 AgcManagerDirect(const AgcManagerDirect&) = delete;
46 AgcManagerDirect& operator=(const AgcManagerDirect&) = delete;
47
48 void Initialize();
49 void SetupDigitalGainControl(GainControl* gain_control) const;
50
51 void AnalyzePreProcess(const AudioBuffer* audio);
52 void Process(const AudioBuffer* audio);
53
54 // Call when the capture stream output has been flagged to be used/not-used.
55 // If unused, the manager disregards all incoming audio.
56 void HandleCaptureOutputUsedChange(bool capture_output_used);
57 float voice_probability() const;
58
59 int stream_analog_level() const { return stream_analog_level_; }
60 void set_stream_analog_level(int level);
61 int num_channels() const { return num_capture_channels_; }
62 int sample_rate_hz() const { return sample_rate_hz_; }
63
64 // If available, returns a new compression gain for the digital gain control.
65 absl::optional<int> GetDigitalComressionGain();
66
67 private:
68 friend class AgcManagerDirectTest;
69
70 FRIEND_TEST_ALL_PREFIXES(AgcManagerDirectStandaloneTest,
71 DisableDigitalDisablesDigital);
72 FRIEND_TEST_ALL_PREFIXES(AgcManagerDirectStandaloneTest,
73 AgcMinMicLevelExperiment);
74 FRIEND_TEST_ALL_PREFIXES(AgcManagerDirectStandaloneTest,
75 AgcMinMicLevelExperimentDisabled);
76 FRIEND_TEST_ALL_PREFIXES(AgcManagerDirectStandaloneTest,
77 AgcMinMicLevelExperimentOutOfRangeAbove);
78 FRIEND_TEST_ALL_PREFIXES(AgcManagerDirectStandaloneTest,
79 AgcMinMicLevelExperimentOutOfRangeBelow);
80 FRIEND_TEST_ALL_PREFIXES(AgcManagerDirectStandaloneTest,
81 AgcMinMicLevelExperimentEnabled50);
82 FRIEND_TEST_ALL_PREFIXES(AgcManagerDirectStandaloneTest,
83 AgcMinMicLevelExperimentEnabledAboveStartupLevel);
84
85 // Dependency injection for testing. Don't delete |agc| as the memory is owned
86 // by the manager.
87 AgcManagerDirect(Agc* agc,
88 int startup_min_level,
89 int clipped_level_min,
90 int sample_rate_hz);
91
92 void AnalyzePreProcess(const float* const* audio, size_t samples_per_channel);
93
94 void AggregateChannelLevels();
95
96 std::unique_ptr<ApmDataDumper> data_dumper_;
97 static int instance_counter_;
98 const bool use_min_channel_level_;
99 const int sample_rate_hz_;
100 const int num_capture_channels_;
101 const bool disable_digital_adaptive_;
102
103 int frames_since_clipped_;
104 int stream_analog_level_ = 0;
105 bool capture_output_used_;
106 int channel_controlling_gain_ = 0;
107
108 std::vector<std::unique_ptr<MonoAgc>> channel_agcs_;
109 std::vector<absl::optional<int>> new_compressions_to_set_;
110};
111
112class MonoAgc {
113 public:
114 MonoAgc(ApmDataDumper* data_dumper,
115 int startup_min_level,
116 int clipped_level_min,
117 bool disable_digital_adaptive,
118 int min_mic_level);
119 ~MonoAgc();
120 MonoAgc(const MonoAgc&) = delete;
121 MonoAgc& operator=(const MonoAgc&) = delete;
122
123 void Initialize();
124 void HandleCaptureOutputUsedChange(bool capture_output_used);
125
126 void HandleClipping();
127
128 void Process(const int16_t* audio,
129 size_t samples_per_channel,
130 int sample_rate_hz);
131
132 void set_stream_analog_level(int level) { stream_analog_level_ = level; }
133 int stream_analog_level() const { return stream_analog_level_; }
134 float voice_probability() const { return agc_->voice_probability(); }
135 void ActivateLogging() { log_to_histograms_ = true; }
136 absl::optional<int> new_compression() const {
137 return new_compression_to_set_;
138 }
139
140 // Only used for testing.
141 void set_agc(Agc* agc) { agc_.reset(agc); }
142 int min_mic_level() const { return min_mic_level_; }
143 int startup_min_level() const { return startup_min_level_; }
144
145 private:
146 // Sets a new microphone level, after first checking that it hasn't been
147 // updated by the user, in which case no action is taken.
148 void SetLevel(int new_level);
149
150 // Set the maximum level the AGC is allowed to apply. Also updates the
151 // maximum compression gain to compensate. The level must be at least
152 // |kClippedLevelMin|.
153 void SetMaxLevel(int level);
154
155 int CheckVolumeAndReset();
156 void UpdateGain();
157 void UpdateCompressor();
158
159 const int min_mic_level_;
160 const bool disable_digital_adaptive_;
161 std::unique_ptr<Agc> agc_;
162 int level_ = 0;
163 int max_level_;
164 int max_compression_gain_;
165 int target_compression_;
166 int compression_;
167 float compression_accumulator_;
168 bool capture_output_used_ = true;
169 bool check_volume_on_next_process_ = true;
170 bool startup_ = true;
171 int startup_min_level_;
172 int calls_since_last_gain_log_ = 0;
173 int stream_analog_level_ = 0;
174 absl::optional<int> new_compression_to_set_;
175 bool log_to_histograms_ = false;
176 const int clipped_level_min_;
177};
178
179} // namespace webrtc
180
181#endif // MODULES_AUDIO_PROCESSING_AGC_AGC_MANAGER_DIRECT_H_
182
